EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for ordering the All-Access Pass.
EmailTemplate.name: CLE All Access Pass
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for ordering the All-Access Pass.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!OrderApi__Receipt_Line__c.OrderApi__Contact__c},
Thank you for ordering the All-Access Pass.
路 We have updated your NYSBA account to allow for unlimited On-Demand program access.
路 Just add any recorded program to your cart from our On-Demand CLE catalog and proceed with the checkout process, where the price will be updated to $0.00
路 To view any program(s) you added, please log-in and click on My Learning Dashboard, then launch the program(s) from your list.
路 Your All-Access Pass will expire one-year from your date of original purchase.
If you have any questions regarding your receipt, please contact our Member Resource Center at 800-582-2452 or via e-mail at mrc@nysba.org
Thank you,
The New York State Bar Association
One Elk Street
Albany, NY 12207
518-463-3200
www.nysba.org
